$Cleric Thomas${action:Talk}
Go to Marian's Shrine and search for the Sage's Staff and the Vision Orb.
There is no time to waste. Go!!

$Cleric Jake$
Huff huhh...
(Jake is panting heavily.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Where in Marian's Shrine does the door lead to?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Cynthia${action:Talk}
Yes ...the door! The wooden door constructed that leads to Marian's Shrine from Frost Wind Forest. I'm amazed that the door is still around ...
and he even managed to find it.

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Through the door, you will reach the lowest level of Marian's Shrine. It's a long and narrow pasSage that wasn't been used for a long time. Be extra careful.
Go to Marian's Shrine right away. Before you lose him for good!

$Master Sorceress Cynthia${action:Talk}
Let's get to work.
That Dragon Follower must not get out of Marian's Shrine. Or else, he'll escape from Mana Ridge forever!

$Cleric Thomas${action:Talk}
Go to Marian's Shrine and search for the Sage's Staff and the Vision Orb.
There is no time to waste. Go!!

$Cleric Jake$
Huff huhh...
(Jake is panting heavily.)

$Cleric Jake$
Huff huff…
Well, that was a good fight…
You are now a powerful Templar Knight... Urghh...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why… why are you wearing a Dragon Follower's mask? Why...?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Jake$
Are you surprised to find out that I'm the Dragon Follower?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... You... lied to us? You betrayed us all?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Jake$
My mission ... was to steal the Sage's Staff... and the Vision Orb from Mana Ridge… but I took too long… (coughs badly)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why... why did you choose to join the evil side?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Jake$
I have... no regrets... nor any resentment...
I only did what I had to do… and you and I are just pursuing different paths…

$Cleric Jake$
(Coughs)Good and evil are like… two sides of a same coin… Which side you turn to only depends on the circumstances… The evil side may take over you one day too...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Repent! If you die... I will kill all the Dragon Followers in this world!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Jake$
Urghh.... There isn't enough time... I did not fulfill my dream ... But you... fulfill yours... *cough cough* ... When you break free from the norms... you will be enlightened ... Live your own life… Don't be commanded or tied down by anyone or anything...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ah ... No! Please don't die! Open your eyes!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Jake${action:Talk}
Ha... Ha... This ain't... too bad...
{user_nick}... My brother... We may not be related by blood... But I treated you as one of my own... The ordeal... is yet to be over. (Coughs)... I hope... you can achieve your goals...

$Cleric Jake$
(Jake smiles faintly. You hold his still body close and shout his name but he does not respond...
Your mind is in a chaotic mess with the pain from the betrayal of a trusted friend.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I have retrieved... the Orb and the Staff.<FONT size=2 face=Arial></FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Thomas$
What happened?
Did you let the Dragon Follower slip away again? Where are the Orb and the Staff...?

$Cleric Thomas${action:Talk}
They've been found?! Wonderful! Well done indeed!
Thanks to you, the Templar Knights are redeemed! This is great news!
But...did something happen?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You told me that humans can't be trusted... You were worried that I would get hurt...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Thomas${action:Talk2}
W-what do you mean...? Jake was a Dragon Follower...?
Jake who fought against the evil more than anyone…? It can't be true…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do you think was the dream he wanted to fulfill…?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Thomas$
Jake... Argh...
(Thomas looks somber and remains quiet for a while)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Jake... What was the dream that you believed in…? For what…?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Thomas$
I can't really tell what Jake's intentions were, but...
Maybe... maybe he wanted to be stopped by you...
I don't know what to say...
